name: watchtower
description:
A watchtower is a daemon that watches your channels and prevents the other party from stealing funds by broadcasting an old state.

Example:

daemon setup:

  bitraam -o setconfig enable_plugin_watchtower True
  bitraam -o setconfig watchtower_user wtuser
  bitraam -o setconfig watchtower_password wtpassword
  bitraam -o setconfig watchtower_port 12345
  bitraam daemon -v

client setup:

  bitraam -o setconfig watchtower_url http://wtuser:wtpassword@127.0.0.1:12345
